column.name: WARHS
column.title: From W/H
column.sql: SELECT DISTINCT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE INACTIVE <> 'Y'
SELECT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE WARHSNAME = '%ME%'
SELECT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE WARHSNAME = '%ME%'

column.name: BIN
column.title: From Loc
column.sql: SELECT LOCNAME FROM WARHOUSE WHERE WARHSNAME = %WARHS%
SELECT LOCNAME FROM WARHOUSE WHERE WARHSNAME = %WARHS% and LOCNAME = '%ME%'
SELECT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE WARHSNAME = '%ME%'

column.name: WARHS
column.title: From W/H
column.sql: SELECT DISTINCT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE INACTIVE <> 'Y'
SELECT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE WARHSNAME = '%ME%'
SELECT WARHSNAME FROM WAREHOUSES WHERE WARHSNAME = '%ME%'
